bug.author: JimmyWhitaker
bug.description: error: [gme:server:worker:simpleworker:pid_100889:WorkerFunctions:PluginManagerBase:plugin:ExecutePipeli ne] TypeError: Cannot read property 'charAt' of null

comments.comment: Can you check out the branch <denchmark-link:https://github.com/dfst/deepforge/tree/660-job-not-starting>660-job-not-starting</denchmark-link> ? If you can replicate this issue on that branch, it should give a better idea of what is causing the error. If you can't replicate it, I will probably merge that branch so that when it happens again, we can get a better idea of the cause...
